metadata.name: The Living
metadata.description:
Digital representation of dreams and desires borned at home during quarantine.

#1 in the 'Homagination' Collection.
25s loop MP4 1920x1080. High-res video available.

Step1
Look at the animations till the end.

Step2
Try to synchronize the breath with the objects: inhale when they are floating and exhale when they return leaned to the floor.

Step3
This makes us aware of how important are the things that sometimes we take for granted.
